dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Hey, I heard you just came back from your vacation. How was it?

dialogues.speaker: Friend
dialogues.text: Oh, it was amazing! I went to Hawaii and spent a week on the beautiful beaches.

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Lucky you! Did you do any exciting activities?

dialogues.speaker: Friend
dialogues.text: Yes, I tried surfing for the first time. It was challenging but so much fun!

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: I've always wanted to try surfing. How did you learn?

dialogues.speaker: Friend
dialogues.text: I took a few lessons from a local instructor. They taught me the basics and helped me catch my first wave.
